title: Easiest Ways to Cancel a Return Order on Amazon

steps.title: Tap the profile icon at the bottom.
steps.content: Tap the profile icon at the bottom. It's the outline of a person at the bottom-center of the Amazon mobile app. You will only be able to cancel an Amazon return if you haven't yet shipped or dropped off the item.

steps.title: Tap Your Orders to bring up your recent orders.
steps.content: Tap Your Orders to bring up your recent orders. It's near the top of the screen.

steps.title: Tap View return/refund status on the item.
steps.content: Tap View return/refund status on the item. This displays the return details.

steps.title: Tap the Manage return button.
steps.content: Tap the Manage return button. Here you'll find the option to cancel the return.

steps.title: Tap Cancel return and then again to confirm.
steps.content: Tap Cancel return and then again to confirm. The Amazon return is now canceled. If Cancel return isn't available, the item has already been scanned for return, or a replacement has already been shipped to you. Contact Amazon for help by tapping the profile icon > Your Account > Contact Us .

steps.title: Click Returns & Orders at the top-right corner of Amazon.
steps.content: Click Returns & Orders at the top-right corner of Amazon. This displays your most recent orders. If you've requested a return on any of the orders, you'll see "Return started" above the product's name. You can't cancel a return if you've already shipped or dropped off the item to Amazon.

steps.title: Click View return/refund status.
steps.content: Click View return/refund status . It's the second button to the right of the product name.

steps.title: Click the Manage return button.
steps.content: Click the Manage return button. It's near the top of the page below the return timeline.

steps.title: Click the Cancel return button, and then again to confirm.
steps.content: Click the Cancel return button, and then again to confirm. Once you confirm the cancelation by clicking Cancel return a second time, your return will be canceled. If Cancel return isn't available, the item has already been scanned for return, or a replacement has already been shipped to you. To contact Amazon for help, hover your mouse over your name at the top of Amazon.com, select Customer Service , select the product, and choose the option to chat with a representative.

steps.title: Open your recent orders.
steps.content: Open your recent orders. If you requested a refund for a product you ordered from a third-party Amazon seller and no longer need the refund, you can cancel the request as long as Amazon hasn't yet made their decision. [1] X Research source In the Amazon mobile app, tap the outline of a person at the bottom, then tap Your Orders . On a computer, click Returns & Orders at the top-right corner of the page.

steps.title: Select Problem with order on the order.
steps.content: Select Problem with order on the order. If you're using the mobile app, tap the order to find this option. If you're on a computer, scroll down to the item, then tap Problem with order to the right of the product name.

steps.title: Click or tap Withdraw Request and follow the on-screen instructions.
steps.content: Click or tap Withdraw Request and follow the on-screen instructions. Explain why you're canceling the refund request (e.g., the seller sent you a replacement), then click or tap Submit . Amazon may need to review the cancelation request before approving it. If the request to cancel is denied, you will need to submit an appeal. [2] X Research source Here's how: Return to Problem with an order on the product. Select Appeal decision . Enter your comments and tap Submit .
